title: Noteworthy ETF Inflows: XLI, UNP, LMT, UPS - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the The Industrial Select Sector SPDR Fund (Symbol: XLI) where we have detected an approximate $181.6 million dollar inflow -- that's a 1.9% increase week over week in outstanding units (from 127,280,000 to 129,680,000). Among the largest underlying components of XLI, in trading today Union Pacific Corp (Symbol: UNP) is up about 3.4%, Lockheed Martin Corp (Symbol: LMT) is up about 0.5%, and United Parcel Service Inc (Symbol: UPS) is up by about 2.2%. For a complete list of holdings, visit the XLI Holdings page » The chart below shows the one year price performance of XLI, versus its 200 day moving average:
